thread.title: Why Caterpillar Investors Could Go Hungry
thread.title_full: Why Caterpillar Investors Could Go Hungry - WSJ

author: Charley Grant
title: Why Caterpillar Investors Could Go Hungry
text:
Caterpillar’s restructuring plan, while painful for shareholders, is a step in the right direction. Even so, the worst isn’t over.
Evidently, the protracted slowdown in mining and energy has taken its toll on Caterpillar. Shares tumbled Thursday after the heavy-equipment manufacturer announced $1.5 billion in annual cost reductions.
